synthesis_conditions.drying_method: air-dried and heated under high vacuum at 150°C for 24 h

synthesis_conditions.activation: activated at 150°C under a dynamic vacuum (below 5 μm Hg) for 24 h
synthesis_conditions.scxrd_analysis: Oxford Cryo stream system on a XtaLAB PRO MM007-DW diffractometer system

breakthrough_experiments.column_details: custom-made stainless steel column (3.15 mm I.D. × 450 mm) with silica wool
breakthrough_experiments.activation_details: activated in-situ in the column at 373 K with a high vacuum for 12 h
breakthrough_experiments.regeneration_method: regenerated in-situ in the column at room temperature with a high vacuum or helium sweeping for 2 h

synthesis_conditions.recyclability_test: Continuous breakthrough experiments for pure C3H6 were carried out with helium sweeping as a regeneration method, showing no obvious loss of adsorption capacity after 50 cycles
